India being a vast multilingual country,: ভারত অসি পাক-চাউরবা লোলয়াম ঙাংবা লৈবাক অমা ওইবা মরম্না, ভারতকী মীশিংগী 90% দি মখোয়গী মহৈ-মশিনগী, খুন্নাইগী অমসুং দিজিটেলগী এক্টিভিটিশিং পাংথোকপদা মফমদুগী ওইবা লোলশিংদা তাংজৈ।
As the volume of internet users multipli: ইন্টরনেট য়ুজরশিংগী মশিং হেনগৎলকপা অমদি শেল-থুমগী, মহৈ-মশিনগী অমসুং শেনমিৎলোনগী থবক-থৌরমশিংগীদমক্তা দিজিটেল প্লেটফোর্মশিং এক্সেস তৌবগী দিমান্দ অমা লৈরকপগা লোয়ননা, অহানবদা ভারতকী লোলশিং অসিদা মীৎয়েং চঙবা মথৌ তাই।

Speech recognition is a technology that: স্পিচ রিকগনিসন হায়বসি স্পিচপু রিএল-টাইম টেক্সতা ওন্থোক্লিবা টেক্নোলোজি অমনি। ভারতকী লোলশিংগী ওইবা অসিগুম্বা মোদেল অমনা, এজুকেসন, হেল্ঠকেয়র অমসুং মিদিয়াগুম্বা তোঙান-তোঙানবা সেক্টরশিংদা, দিজিটেল ফার্ষ্ট মোদেল অমা শাগৎপগী মচাক ওইবগী ওইথোকপা লৈ।

Speech recognition relies on \"machine-l: স্পিচ রিকগনিসন্না, দাইভর্সিফাইদ ইন্দিয়ান ভোইসশিং অমসুং মরি লৈনবা টেক্সট য়াউবা দেটাসেটশিংগী য়াম্না পাক-চাউরবা কল্লেক্সনশিং মথৌ তারিবা "মেছিন-লর্নিং" টেক্নোলোজিদা তাংজৈ। বাক্যাংশকী খুত্থাংদা EkStep না ইনিসিএটিব অসিগীদমক্তা শিজিন্নবা য়াবা ভারতকী লোল ঙাংবা ইন্দিয়ান ভোইসকী দাইভর্স ওপন রিপোজিটরি অমা শেম্বা পাম্মী।

Bolo India: A crowdsourcing initiative f: Bolo India: A crowdsourcing initiative for Indian languages
India needs to be Atma Nirbhar in the ar: India needs to be Atma Nirbhar in the area of speech recognition in Indian languages. Hence, we want to create an open data repository of many Indian voices. This is an effort by MeitY, Government of India, under the National Language Translation Mission (NLTM). This effort is supported by EkStep Foundation on a pro-bono basis and leverages its open source work under sunbird.org along with various other open source frameworks.
Bolo India invites you to volunteer and: Bolo India invites you to volunteer and contribute your voice for this cause. All your contributions are automatically processed and made available as open data in a useful fashion back to the community. Such data then can be used by all language enthusiasts and technologists to develop world class speech recognition applications.
India is a land of many languages, our d: India is a land of many languages, our digital strategy must reflect it.
90% of India's population uses region la: 90% of India's population uses region languages to conduct their day-to-day activities.
As more and more people use digital plat: As more and more people use digital platforms for financial, educational and social activities, digital platforms must work seamlessly in Indian Languages.
We need to build speech recognition tech: We need to build speech recognition technologies that are tuned for your language.  It must have high accuracy and understand the daily language and communications of people in your language.
Having open world class speech recogniti: Having open world class speech recognition in your language will enable a digital first model in your language in various sectors such as: education, healthcare and media.
The tools, utilities and models propose: The tools, utilities and models  proposed to be developed in your language will rely on open source contributions through Bolo India crowd sourcing platform
Speech recognition relies on \"machine-l: Speech recognition relies on "machine-learning" technology that requires large datasets that include diverse voices and the corresponding text. Through Bolo India, we want to create a diverse open repository of Indian voices speaking Indian languages which can be used for this initiative
We are inviting you to join us and volun: We are inviting you to join us and voluntarily contribute your voice to this initiative. Recording your voice at one stretch can be overwhelming hence you can do this by visiting the website multiple times and commence from where you left us off

Earn badges or certificate by contributi: Earn badges or certificate by contributing to Bolo India. Speak a sentence in language of your choice or validate the sentence that is spoken on your desired language. Share badges in your social circle, build the hype, motivate your friends and family to contribute towards the cause. The strength of Bolo India is in the diversity of the people i.e. YOU.
The levels defined by an overall mix of: The levels defined by an overall mix of contributions and validations on Bolo India. Please see the criteria that defines different levels below:
Please note that your levels and badges: Please note that your levels and badges may take upto 48hrs to update. Your contribution does not expire, but may decrease though if it doesn’t pass the validation test. We want you to remain an active contributor to Bolo India and stand a chance to get recognised by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.
